snippet.title: Lurking Trailer
snippet.description:
Stifled, the spiritual successor to Lurking is coming! (http://www.stifledgame.com)

Lurking is a Survival Thriller game where sound is the only way you see, and they hear your fears.

Get the game : http://lurking-game.com
Find us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/lurkinggame
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/lurkinggame
Check out the Oculus Demo : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5etj1FV3vw
GameJolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/other/lurking/26289/
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/lurking

When played with a microphone, the game can detect and convert a range of sounds form breathing to screams into in-game visuals which adds a layer of immersion.

Find the team on the interwebs using the links below!

PRODUCER, ART DIRECTOR and GAME DESIGNER
Ng Guo Xiong Justin (@thatjustinng)
http://www.justafolio.com

LEAD GAME DESIGNER and LEVEL DESIGNER
Dexter Chng Shi Rong
http://shirongchng.wix.com/dexterchng

TECHNICAL DIRECTOR
Soo Zhong Min (@rainyrhy)
http://ity.per.sg/

AUDIO ENGINEER and PROGRAMMER
Bryan Teo An Ping (@_Lyrinn)
http://bryan-teo.com/
